room_item_detail.item_detail: The desk Karin, caretaker of the guildhouse, uses for work. This is where she handles all of her paperwork and tasks, such as issuing skip tickets.

Landosol scenery reminiscent of home that puts you at ease.
Guildhouse wallpaper. The sunshine filtering through the window gently illuminates the room.
A transparent wall. You can't see it, but it will protect you from the wind and rain. The wall is made so that the outside can be seen from the inside, but the inside cannot be seen from the outside.
Transparent floorboards. You can't see it, but the floor is there. It might be a little scary to use these floorboards for somewhere high up.
You'll never run out with this rice ball. The perfect amount of salt, the right shape, and the fact that you can eat it endlessly makes this a must for foodies!
A book stand where you can place your favorite book of magic. Its fantastical design will make you feel like a powerful wizard!
Throw in your favorite vegetables and ingredients, simmer slowly, and ta-da! Delicious stew for dinner tonight!
A cute plush toy modeled after Lima that's softer than anything else.
Diffuses aromatic oils around the room. It is very safe as it does not use fire. The latest trend is a floral scent made with flowers from the Prano Plains.
Diffuses aromatic oils around the room. Place it higher up for the fragrance to spread even wider!
This bookcase can accommodate books of varying sizes, from comics to magic books.
A gorgeous white bookcase. It's especially popular with the ladies because of its design and the large number of books it can hold.
A versatile, square table that can easily accommodate four people. Perfect for chatting or playing cards on.
A practical, wooden desk. You can play games on it, or sit and talk about relationships for hours. But in the end, nothing beats having everyone sit around the table for a nice meal!
A simple wooden chair that's plain but durable. If it happens to break, it can be fixed right away—if there's someone who can fix it, of course.
This round chair is great for taking a short break. You can't spin around on it, but you can turn to talk in any direction while seated.
The fragrance and comfort of this white, wooden bed means a good night's sleep is guaranteed. But don't jump up and down on the bed as it might break.
A rustic, wooden chest of drawers to store things like clothes or any secret savings. It's bad manners to open it without permission.
Wooden partitions to create a warm, private space.
These wooden walls brighten up the room as their gentle fragrance relaxes the mind and body.
Wooden floor made of two different shades of wood, waxed and polished for a super smooth surface. This type of flooring suits places like classrooms.
A wooden spiral staircase. The creaking steps when you climb up might remind you of home.
A wooden spiral staircase that makes you want to run down it. Just be careful not to rush and fall over.
This dark brown, cat-legged table is the height of luxury. Place a tablecloth on top for a tasteful and elegant look.
A chic, mahogany desk from a famous, long-established brand with a hint of sophistication catered toward the older generation.
A dark brown chair with decorative carvings on the back. Made from Astraean mahogany, its beautiful appearance and customizability make it a popular item.
A small but sturdy, round chair. It may look handy as a step, but using it for anything other than sitting is dangerous.
A mahogany wooden bed. Place cushions on the headboard and rest your back on it for a great couch.
A four-drawer chest. It is much deeper than it appears, so you can easily store larger items like wizard's robes and sticks.

A partition created from a single piece of mahogany. Since it will be the first piece of furniture people see when coming in through the front door, this partition was crafted with great care to detail.
Wallpaper with a mahogany frame for decoration and reinforcement. While simple, the wood brings out a sense of warmth.
Mosaic patterned floorboards in different colors. Remember to wax the floor and try not to skate on it after.
A mahogany, spiral staircase that takes you to the upper floor. The curve of the railing makes it perfect for sliding on.
A mahogany, spiral staircase that takes you to the lower floor. Be careful not to fall, as it might take a while for someone to notice.
A charming pink table. It may be just perfect for writing a letter to a loved one.
A lovely pink desk, perfectly designed with enough space for a tea set and an assortment of desserts. It's the perfect addition to a fancy room.
A cute pink chair. Despite its dainty appearance, it is sturdy and easy to sit on.
Upholstered stool with pink and white stripes. Make sure to get enough of these stools for everyone, as there could be a scuffle to sit on one.
A soft pink couch. This pink is a very popular color at Landosol and is the same shade as the coral found along the Marjan coast.
A comfy couch for two. You can relax as you sit on it, or even find yourself falling asleep as you're lounging.
A pipe bed with a pink frame and pillows. The pillows and blankets come in a variety of shades. Fun dreams are sure to come!
A chest of drawers with white wood painted in pink. It's perfect for storing everyday items and keeping the room tidy.
A pink plywood partition that helps give a little more privacy, though not soundproof. It's proper etiquette in Landosol to pretend not to have overheard anything.
This pink rug adds an accent to the room and will make anyone standing on it look even more charming.
This pink-walled room will make anyone want to decorate it with flowers and stuffed animals. This cute-on-cute phenomenon has attracted the attention of the Landosol Academic Society.
Install these pink floorboards with pink walls and furniture to complete the look. Make your room uniform in the traditional, happy color of Landosol!
A simple, white table that's extremely versatile. It brings a sense of calmness to any busy room.
A large white desk. Its simple yet somewhat luxurious design is a favorite among those who want to keep their rooms stylishly tidy.
A simple white chair. Put it together with a desk, and it'll look like something you might imagine in the living room of a luxurious mansion.
A stool made of genuine leather. It's all white and taut now, but as it ages, it becomes softer and more comfortable.
People love the firm, natural texture of this ecru couch. Makes for a practical interior design.
This ecru, two-seater couch is an excellent piece of furniture that looks good in any part of the room. Just be careful not to spill anything on it.
A basic, white pipe bed that gives a clean look. But choose your bedding carefully, or it might look like a bed at the hospital.
A medium-sized, white drawer. While the color and design don't necessarily stand out, the subtlety makes this item perfect for serving as the mainstay of the room.
White partitions that can be set up to prevent guests from seeing the inside of your house when they enter through the front door.
A white, half-size rug that goes with any color floor. It's also infused with magic to prevent it from getting dirty, so it's safe to step on this rug with your shoes or your bare feet.
A wall in constant danger of being graffitied on. You should always keep a supply of poisonous mushrooms from the Elven Forest on hand as they function as powerful cleaning agents.
Pure white floorboards. You may want to avoid stepping on them in hopes of keeping them clean, but stepping is what a floor is for, so don't be shy.
A white spiral staircase. The thing to do in Landosol right now is to dress up in your favorite clothes and sing your way down the steps with a bouquet of flowers in your hand.
White stairs that take you down to the lower floor. No gaps between the steps means nothing can fall through.
This table is made of a black wood called Astraean ebony from the southern part of the continent. Even if your room is a little lacking in style, this table will give it a nice, cool look.
A large black desk. Made from Astraean ebony, its modern design is popular with the gentlemen in the city.
A simple black chair. Though stylish enough on its own, it also looks great with white furniture for a monochrome interior.
A leather stool. Though there are different grades of leather with some bogus products using dyed monster hide, this stool is made with genuine leather.
A black leather couch. Just sitting on it will make you look like a person of class.
A black, leather couch for two. It's easy to clean and effective in hiding stains left by children.
A black pipe bed. The chic color and design of the bed go with any wallpaper or flooring. Comes with classy, monotone bedding.
A simple, black accessory case. The bottom two parts have locks, making it perfect for storing important things that you don't want people to see.
An all-black partition. You may be tempted to look behind it, but you must not under any circumstances.
This black, half-size rug is chic and well-designed. Handle carefully when washing as the color may fade.
Black wallpaper to give your room that extra touch. Though you can never go wrong with black, it does require a good sense of style to incorporate it. Great for advanced interior designers.
Footprints stick surprisingly well to these floorboards. Frequent wiping is necessary to maintain their sleekness.
A black spiral staircase. It's very difficult to see where the steps are, so make sure to turn on the light when you use it.
A black, spiral staircase that takes you down to the lower floor. Its somber color gives a feeling of being led into a dark, underground world—or even hell.
A luxurious, bright red couch with all-silk upholstery. Currently, only the Wistaria family owns one in all of Landosol.
A two-seater luxury couch that can be put together with a single-seater, making it the perfect place to stretch out for a nap.
This luxurious, red rug with gold stitching can make anything you put on it stand out.
This carpet is made of a combination of yarns. The different shades of color are woven into a traditional Astrum pattern.
A spiral staircase upholstered in red cloth. An affordable item that looks like it could be found in a royal palace at first glance.
Any girl descending this glittering staircase will look like a princess on her way to the ball.
These retro, wooden barrels help create a cool and stylish space like that of a sophisticated coffee shop.
A chic brown couch from a famous, long-established brand. The leather scent and the calm color of this couch are perfect for resting in a refined space.
A chic, brown two-seater couch from a famous, long-established brand. Lie down using the cushions as pillows and you'll get as good a night's sleep as you would in a bed.
A slightly larger houseplant. Get more greenery in your life.
A small houseplant. Great for decoration and feng shui.
Beautiful flowers in three different colors that will put you in a sunny mood.
A white ceramic vase that brings life into the room. Any flower looks beautiful in it, but sunflowers suit this vase perfectly.
A white fireplace fit for royalty. The luxurious marble and attention to detail in its design are enthralling.
An old-fashioned brick fireplace. You can almost see Santa Claus coming down through it.
A cupboard perfect for storing things with a convenient, sliding door at the bottom.
A medicine cabinet. Children should not be allowed near it. Be sure to handle the medicine carefully and don't use it to make anything strange for someone.
A wooden bottle rack. A wide variety of drinks can be stored here for when you're thirsty.
A chic, old-fashioned table clock. The soft sound of the second hand reveals the attention to detail of the craftsman behind it.
A lavish, white table clock. The fine design of this clock is based on a distinguished brand and would look at home in a royal palace.
A fishing rod the ladies like to use when catching fish. It is very popular in Landosol because of its durability as well as flexibility.
Everyone's favorite stuffed cat. It is so adorable that even those who prefer dogs will find their hearts melting!
A suit of armor modeled after that of the Defenders of the Throne. Pieced together from iron plates, it can stand against any attack. It also comes alive at night... Just kidding.
A beautiful white dress that's perfect for balls and parties. Every girl needs to try this dress on at least once.
This lovely pink dress by a famous designer comes with an abundance of ribbons and ruffles, making it all the rage among the girls in Landosol.
A charming outfit made to resemble that of everyone's favorite maid. A word of welcome from someone in this outfit is sure to make anyone feel like royalty.
A statue of a beautiful woman that's often found at popular date spots in the city. Now you can place one in your room to recreate that feeling.
A statue of a famous wizard. He was so powerful that he left his mark on the history of Astraea and is still considered a standard for wizards to this day.
This wall hanging is comprised of several kinds of flowers. It's a gorgeous piece of work that effortlessly adds a touch of style to your room.
A landscape painting by a famous artist. It brings sophistication to any room when hung on a wall.
A round painting titled "Tondo." No one knows who the model in the painting is, but no one is all that interested either, so it's being left as is.
Iron shield that can be mounted on a wall. It seems to be popular with those seeking a design reminiscent of knights and chivalry.
A pair of swords that can be mounted on a wall. Though the swords aren't for practical use, they'll make your house look just like a knight's.
Stylish black handrail. It can also be used as partitioning to give more variety to your interior.
Stylish white railing. Place it around the plants for a beautiful flower bed. Just don't go jumping over or on it.
Turn your room into a church with this beautiful stained glass partition!
A magnificent brick partition. You can use these partitions to make your own maze in the room.
A solid wall made of stone that can hold any enemy back.
Press your cheeks on this cold marble wall to cool yourself down on a hot day.
A brick wall that can withstand wind and rain—but that doesn't mean you can lay out your frustrations on it.
Cobblestone flooring that's quite hard. It may be best to avoid running around on it as it could be dangerous.
Marble flooring that goes well with refined furniture for a luxurious interior.
This brick flooring can transform your room into one from a foreign country.
A beautifully designed mosaic tile floor that goes well with castle-like decor.
Black and white tile flooring that matches monochrome furniture to transform any room into a unique space!
This red and white tile flooring is designed to go with any kind of interior and creates a fun atmosphere.
Cute pink background material. The delicate, girly design goes well with elegant furniture.
Pale pink background material. Its subtle charm gives a somewhat sophisticated atmosphere to the room.
Beautiful, blue background material. The calm, azure color is comforting and goes well with plain furniture.
Pale blue background material. The azure color gently envelops the room to create a relaxing atmosphere.
Yellow background material. The girls are sure to feel energized like the sun. It goes well with bright interiors.
Pale yellow background material. Just like the sun, the warm background will lull the girls into a comfortable slumber.
A tiger rug that's excellent for keeping bare feet warm. It's so realistic that you can almost hear it roar.
White tiles that can be alternated with other tiles to create a stylish, checkered look.
Grey tiles to create an austere yet modern atmosphere. Great for advanced interior designers.
Red tiles. Their vivid color could change the mood of a room in a heartbeat!
Blue tiles. A great choice for those looking to add a cool, tranquil touch to their room.
Yellow tiles. The relaxing, warm hue goes well with white furniture. It's said that mastering the art of design starts from incorporating this kind of color into your interior.
Green tiles that are sure to bring color to any room. Combine them with other tiles to make a mosaic pattern.
Purple tiles. Great for anyone looking to add a sophisticated and bewitching vibe to their room!
Light brown tiles that go well with both Japanese and Western-style interiors. Perfect for those who want a room with a practical feel!

An egg-shaped device that automatically makes mana and emits a beautiful, green light. You need to be qualified to use it, but the device can be easily set up thanks to Karin's certification.

A menu board, just like those found in cafes. Desserts of the day are usually written on the blackboard with markers and chalk.
Proof that you have conquered the "Cloudtop Peak." Rare, mouthwatering monster meat with the finest marbling that appears only near the summit.
Proof that you have conquered the "Deepwood Oak." It is also known as the "World's Most Delicious Fruit." Though the skin is hard and difficult to pierce, the flesh is exquisite.
Proof that you have conquered the Sheercliff Ruins. A dumpling set made from a recipe obtained from the ruins. A supreme dish made of rare meat and vegetables.
Proof that you have conquered Tideborne Tower. Exquisite cotton candy woven from the light, sugary snow that falls only at the tower's peak. Said to bring ecstasy to even the divine.
A fluffy cushion packed full of super soft feathers. The vivid pink cover will provide a colorful accent to any room!
A fancy curtain that can also double as a room partition. The high-quality pink fabric is as enchanting to the touch as to the eye, tempting many to wrap themselves up in its folds.
A pillar from the Caon guildhouse, featuring a white base with yellow accents. Its simple yet classy design is a good match for all sorts of furniture items.
A special selection of Maho's favorite plush animals. Adorable to look at, soft and fluffy to the touch, and huggable beyond belief. Can there be any greater paradise?
A plain barrel used to store the Caon guild members' weapons. Handy for those times when you need to rush out the door with weapon in hand, but dreadfully easy to knock over.
A mysterious treasure chest that Makoto regularly warns visitors not to open. So heavy that only Makoto herself can lift it. Rumors of its contents abound, but nobody knows for sure what lies within.
A delightful lamp that fills the entire room with a soothing glow. Its light, neither too bright nor too gloomy, is a source of comfort to guild members after a tough mission.
The walls of the Caon guildhouse, rich with fairy-tale wonder. Living within these walls, it's easy to imagine that you're a king or queen ruling over your very own fantasyland.
A colorful floor arrangement featuring a variety of traditional rugs. Certain to brighten up any room with its unusual, folksy vibe.
A cute spiral staircase decked out in pink and white. Climbing its steps is sure to make you feel like a princess at a grand ball.
A cute spiral staircase leading down to the floor below. Its elegant pillar features a small alcove holding a single candlestick.
A chic, black lacquered chair. Carved using traditional techniques, its confident lines reflect the artisan's artistic flair.
A chic, black lacquered table. Popular with the refined ladies of Landosol, perhaps for its air of eminence and class.
A chic, black lacquered stool. The cherry blossom design on the front heralds the coming of spring. Naturally, it's also very comfy to sit on.
A must for any traditional eastern-style room. Woven from the pith of the soft rush plant, these mats have an inviting scent and texture that make you want to lie down atop them.
An ornate folding screen decorated with real gold. While it can be used as a separator in a luxury room, it also qualifies as an art piece in its own right.
A lantern decorated with a cherry blossom pattern. Crafted using a sturdy wooden frame and high-quality paper. When lit, the cherry blossoms seem to glow of their own accord.
A unique structure designed to bring the traditional eastern tearoom experience into your own home. Comes complete with its own selection of teas and sweet treats.
A bell used in shrine ceremonies. In the hands of a traditional dancer, its tinkling peals ring out in time to the elegant motions. Wave it about too much, though, and you might annoy people.
This tree embodies the spirit of spring. Beneath its branches, any scene transforms into a delightful picnic. Its fluttering blossoms are a treat for all the senses.
A traditional sliding screen wall imported from a far-eastern land. Decorated with spring-themed imagery to brighten the hearts of all who see it.
A sophisticated wooden floor decorated with a fine red carpet. The perfect backdrop to a set of spring-themed furnishings.
A small stool made from a spongy material. It weighs very little and has no hard edges, so it's completely child-safe. This pink model is decorated with a cute bunny logo!
A small stool made from a spongy material. It weighs very little and has no hard edges, so it's completely child-safe. This orange model is decorated with a cool shuriken logo!
A small stool made from a spongy material. It weighs very little and has no hard edges, so it's completely child-safe. This violet model is decorated with an elegant butterfly logo!
A kid-size flowery table that makes you want to invite friends over for an art session. Its smooth surface can be easily cleaned with a single wipe.
Part of a popular series of rugs based on common monsters. Real monsters may be scary, but this cute rug is a great fit for any kid's room.
Have you ever wanted to be a mystical seer? Just hold your hand over this magical orb, and wondrous visions will flutter forth! Disclaimer: Omens of the future not guaranteed.
Sure to be your favorite spot from this day forth! Who could resist a ride on this cuddly little monster? Its adorable design has earned it fans of all ages.
Prank lovers, rejoice! This may just be the biggest jack-in-the-box you've ever seen! As for what happens when you open it... there's only one way to find out!
A classic children's wallpaper decorated with whimsical illustrations. Kids can't get enough of the bright, appealing colors.
A bright and colorful floor design using cheerful pastel colors. Combine it with some cute furniture to complete the Little Lyrical atmosphere.

A fully-featured stage set for karaoke lovers who want to step up their performance. Based on a popular idol group's stage setup, you too can recreate their concerts by combining this main unit with two companion side units. If you place all three in a room together, something special might happen!

A fully-featured stage set for karaoke lovers who want to step up their performance. Based on a popular idol group's stage setup, you too can recreate their concerts by combining two of these side units with a central main unit. Or you can use each unit on its own for some cute solo sessions!
An authentic replica of the snazzy stage outfits used by a certain popular idol group. Themed after the vastness of the galaxy, it's a simply heavenly look.
A style of partition you're sure to have seen at hotels and fancy events. Use it to give your room's layout that exclusive feel.
A fine bench to ease your body after a strenuous event. The extravagant design, which wouldn't seem out of place in a royal palace, lends a refined air to any room.
A decorative fabric pennant featuring the logo of a popular idol group. Hardcore fans buy one to display, one to share with friends, and one to store safely away.
A large fabric banner featuring the logo of a popular idol group. Thanks to its remarkable size, it can even be used as a fancy room partition.
A simple yet imposing pillar, reminiscent of historic buildings. The fabric banners on each side, decorated with a popular idol group's logo, only serve to enhance its appeal.
A wall design decorated with stars and beautiful curtains with a violet gradient. The overall twilight atmosphere transports visitors into a world of fantasy.
An elegant, white dance floor decorated with the logo of a popular idol group. Just add a stage, and you'll have the perfect concert venue!
A hammock rich with summer vibes. The perfect place to curl up and forget about the stress of everyday life. Let it sway you to sleep like the rolling ocean waves.
A partition decorated with an arabesque design. Why not try using a few to give your home the flavor of a fancy resort?
A fancy designer armchair. The deep blue contrasts with the white, calling to mind rolling seas and open skies. Do you hear the sound of waves in the distance?
A two-seater sofa that's easy to sink right into. Exquisitely comfy, whether you're stretching out alone or cuddling up with a partner. And did you know the cushion part is removable?
A practical storage unit for all your dishes and utensils. Decorate with small potted plants for that extra touch to freshen up any room.
A deep blue chest of drawers. Just the right size to fit into any room's layout! The top surface is a perfect spot for small ornaments.
A sleek wardrobe with a simple design. Featuring a striking deep blue that is guaranteed not to fade over time and refreshing white highlights, it's sure to add a little color to your bedroom!
A minimalist cylindrical blue chair with a backrest. Made from a surprisingly soft material, so it's comfortable as well as stylish!
A minimalist cylindrical blue stool. Its simple yet charming silhouette is popular with all ages.
A pair of shelves that can be easily hung from any wall. Use them to liven up a lonely-looking spot!
A sleek white table with an air of elegance. Doesn't it just make you want to sit down and write a handwritten letter? Comes as a set with a deep blue tablecloth. Bargain!
A sizable white table that's perfect for summer. With a single flower carefully positioned in the middle of the regal blue tablecloth, every day will feel somehow special.
Refreshingly bright walls that call to mind a summer getaway. If you peer through the cute little windows, surely you'll see sparkling waves lapping the sand!
A straightforward blue floor that goes well with any room decorated in cool colors. Makes you feel a little cooler in the warmth of summer.
A gorgeous water feature inset into the floor. Just gazing at it calms the soul and lifts the spirits. Bring the ocean into your own home!
A ridable plush Sea Drake with a delightfully cushiony texture. Popular with not only kids, but with men and women of all ages as well! Both decorative and huggable—could you ask for any more?!
A shell-design cushion that wouldn't look out of place in an undersea mermaid kingdom. You can almost see the little fish swimming happily by. Are you the true prince of the sea?
A stool that's pleasantly cool to the touch. This revolution in seating technology has to be felt to be believed! You'll feel refreshed as well as relaxed!

A slender structure that looks like a slice of the ocean itself. It's an aquarium, a partition and a decorative talking point all in one! Surround yourself with several to feel like you've left dry land behind!
A beautiful arrangement of branching coral. The pastel colors make this the perfect decoration. An absolute must for any ocean-themed room! You'll feel like you've grown gills and scales of your own!
A trio of fishy stickers ripe for sticking just about anywhere. Cover the whole room in a great school of them if you like! How fishy are you feeling today?
An enchanting ocean backdrop. Have you wandered into a kingdom beneath the waves?! Call your friends and watch their jaws drop in amazement!
A fancy wallpaper modeled on the deep ocean. Explore an undersea world of your very own! The perfect background for tropical fish stickers.
A decorative floor design meant to resemble the ocean floor. Transform your room into a saltwater paradise! Welcome to the realm of the merfolk!
A shell-design cushion that wouldn't look out of place in an undersea mermaid kingdom. You can almost see the little fish swimming gracefully by. Are you the true princess of the sea?

A special-order costume, overseen by Landosol's greatest ricemeister. Each individual grain is lovingly crafted in every detail. Remarkably enough, it's also designed to be incredibly comfortable to wear, in order to capture the convenience and practicality that the venerable rice ball embodies.

A model cannon used by Nightmare in their combat training. Outwardly identical to the real thing, but instead of cannonballs, it fires cute star effects. Use it at parties to give your guests a big surprise!

A trusty training dummy used by Nightmare. Originally designed specifically for training apprentice knights, it has since garnered attention as an exercise tool for civilians, so it may just become next year's hot item!

Modeled upon the king of beasts, this fountain fixes all who approach with a steely gaze. Far from a soothing water feature, its water flows forth like a wild and untamed river. Rumor has it that if you toss a single rupie into the fountain over your shoulder, your wish will come true.

A spare suit of armor that Jun keeps in the palace for emergencies. The sight of the armor alone is enough to intimidate most passersby. As Jun always keeps it well-maintained, there's not a speck of dust to be seen on its surface.

A spare shield that Matsuri keeps handy for impromptu training sessions. Constructed from lightweight materials, it's easy for even a child to handle. From the many scratches across the surface, it's clear that Matsuri has been training hard.
A grand staircase like those leading to the upper levels of the palace. Designed by one of the finest architects in Astraea, it's a work of art in its own right.
A grand staircase like those leading to the lower levels of the palace. It's always kept so immaculately clean, you'll need to be careful not to slip on the polished surface!
An elegant banner of the finest cloth, just like those seen in the royal palace. The vivid red coloring lends an air of opulence to any room.
A wall lamp of the same model used in the royal palace. Indirect lighting is a must for an elegant interior! Why not see how it changes the atmosphere of your own home?
The dignified design of the royal palace walls. Its elegant white curves speak of virtue and nobility. Even the spring breeze feels somehow more refined when it blows in through these windows.
The marble flooring used in the royal palace. The distinctive clacking sound that rings out when you walk on it only adds to the noble atmosphere.
Who knows what surprises you'll find inside this basketful of Halloween trickery? It's sure to keep you entertained long after the spooky season is over! All together now... "Trick or treat!"
A table filled with Halloween spirit. Perfect for throwing a party with all the sweet treats you've collected. Who knows, you might make friends with some visitors from the other side...
A cute little round table decorated for Halloween. There's no mistaking those bright, seasonal colors! Anyone can see today's a special day!
Have you ever seen such a cute-yet-spooky decoration? Its remarkable presence threatens to dominate the room with Halloween spirit.
A simple candleholder carved from a Halloween pumpkin. Stylish, spooky, and surprisingly relaxing to gaze at!
A classic decorative Halloween pumpkin. You can't start the spooky celebrations without this trusty seasonal mascot. Everyone loves his eerie smirk!
A practical chair with a cute pumpkin design. Lends a certain spookiness to any room.
A handy stool decorated in Halloween colors. Small, light and durable, so you can easily carry it around and use it anywhere. The secret star of the party!
A welcoming armchair that's all too easy to just sink right into. Is there some kind of Halloween magic at work here?!
This Halloween-themed bed is so comfortable, you'll lose consciousness the second you hit the sheets. Spooky nightmares? Perish the thought! You'll rest in peace for sure!
A practical cabinet with some spooky little touches. Filled with all the utensils you'll need for the perfect Halloween party!
How can you fail to love this boldly designed chest of drawers? With ample storage space, it can easily hold your clothes for every season, not just Halloween!
An ornate partition with a spooky twist. Sneak a peek through the bars for some tricky inspiration!
If you're looking to give your room a spooky mood, look no further than this wall design. When the moon comes out, there'll be ghosts about! A Halloween wonderland awaits!
The perfect flooring to match a spooky theme. Set up a few lamps, tables and snacks and hold your very own Halloween dance party!

From the earworms you can't stop humming to beautiful themes that bring back emotional memories, this special jukebox is where you'll find it all. With a tasteful antique design, there's no better home for the melodies you love.

A proper wood-fired oven, perfect for baking sweet treats. The high temperatures it reaches will make your pastries extra crispy. Whether you're an occasional hobby baker or an aspiring patissier, you can't go wrong with quality like this!

A kitchen cupboard complete with all the equipment you need to make some serious coffee. As you prepare your brew in the siphon coffee maker, the tantalizing scent of fresh coffee beans will fill the room. It takes time to get these things right, but boy, is it ever worth it!
The perfect lamp for a stylish cafe. It bathes the room in soothing tones, creating a comfortable space for discerning adults to take a well-earned break.
A wooden table and chair set designed to match a cafe interior. You'll find a hot drink and a selection of sweet morsels laid out ready to enjoy, so sit back and let your worries fade away.
A wooden cafe-style chair, comfortable enough that you could happily sit in it for hours. Enjoy a drink and a snack, or just settle down and enjoy a moment of peace.
A sturdy wooden cafe counter. Why not strike up some friendly conversation with the customers as you prepare their orders? Take advantage of the ample space to cook up a variety of new menu items!

A traditional wooden partition decorated with a little bit of greenery. A must for any cafe interior, since it helps the customers maintain a little privacy. Now let's get down to some juicy conversation!
This menu board is sure to catch the eyes of anyone passing by. The stylish illustration speaks volumes to the love this cafe's staff puts into their craft. Let's see what today's special is!
A wooden ladder leading to the floor above. It can be folded away for easy transportation, so pick the perfect spot and get climbing!
A wooden ladder leading down to the floor below. It's nothing fancy, but feels so reassuringly sturdy that you won't have any trouble getting down. Still, it never hurts to be careful.

A classic wall design that calls to mind a traditional cafe. This comforting interior is the perfect complement for a nice, hot drink. Now you're ready to kick back and enjoy the scent of brewing coffee.
A floor constructed from naturally shaped stone tiles. The refreshing white tones are the perfect match for a cafe interior where you can enjoy a relaxing break in style.

A home away from home for a fairy who enjoys the natural life. Complete with a fairy-sized tea set and a basketful of extremely comfy-looking cushions, even the local sparrows are big fans of the decor. With such an inviting spot in your home, surely Nebbia won't be able to resist dropping by.

A magical picture book whose story seems to come to life as you read it, this festive tale provides a level of immersion no other book can hope to match. You'll feel as though it's drawn you into a whole other world.

A special costume produced under the supervision of Lima herself. She even procured the all-important Santa outfit out of her own pocket. While the thick, fluffy texture is nearly indistinguishable from the real thing, the costume as a whole feels surprisingly light to wear. It would be a crime not to give this passion project a whirl, so let's get dancing!

A traditional holiday tree decorated with twinkling lights and cute ribbons. Watching the bulbs flashing on and off in different patterns never gets old. The only question is, who gets to put the shining star on top?
With a wreath, candles, and ornaments to match, this fireplace is all ready for the festive season. Nothing soothes the soul or warms the heart quite as easily as flickering candlelight.
Someone really went all out decorating this table for the holiday season. With a festive candle, a bottle of bubbly, and even a tiny tree of its own, everything's set to begin the celebrations!
A table that's been tastefully decorated for the festive season. It might not be big enough for a full holiday dinner, but it'll certainly help to set the mood.

A bookshelf in the unmistakable shape of a familiar seasonal decoration. The bell at the top is a cute touch to ring in the festive spirit. Of course, this shelf is no slouch in the storage department either—there's even a sizable compartment tucked away at the bottom!
A sleigh that's so loaded with presents, Santa's going to have trouble finding a spot to sit down. Every good boy and girl deserves their own special treat!
A cute decorative reindeer with two different festively colored antlers. Do you think he'll be pulling Santa's sleigh through the stars and over the rooftops tonight?
A cute decorative reindeer with an unconventional hue to its fur. Do you think he'll be pulling Santa's sleigh across the snowy plains of the North Pole tonight?
Always wanted a reindeer of your own to ride? Well, this chair is the next best thing. Set it up alongside a festive table and enjoy a hearty meal.

You'd be forgiven for trying to eat this stool, because it looks and feels for all the world like a certain chocolatey festive treat. Sadly, it's not actually edible, but it does give off a faint sugary scent.
A two-seater sofa in bright, festive colors. Snuggle up with a special someone, and you might find yourselves in the mood for kissing under the mistletoe.
A comfy armchair in bright, festive colors. If this isn't the time of year to curl up and get comfortable, when is?

A seasonal bed with a frame designed to resemble a sleigh. Best not to let Santa ride this one, though—it's so comfortable, he might sleep right through the big night! The stocking hung up by the pillow may look tiny, but it's made from a flexible material that can hold even the largest of presents.
A wall decked out with festive garlands. Can't have a festive season without the proper decorations!

A wooden floor with a great big rug in a patchwork of comforting festive colors. Just what you need to warm your body and heart through the winter months. It looks so inviting, you'll be tempted to curl up and go to sleep right there!
A traditional New Year's decoration made from two plump rice cakes topped with an orange. Said to symbolize good fortune in the year ahead, it's a must for any discerning household.
A traditional New Year's decoration centered on three fine columns of bamboo. Place it near the entrance to a dwelling to invite the spirits' blessings for the year ahead.
An adorable tepee-style tent decorated with a starry design. The cushions inside may look like freshly fallen snow, but once you curl up on them, you'll be comfy enough to hibernate until spring.
A simple white rocking chair. As you rock yourself to and fro, you'll feel all of your worries drifting away. Careful not to rock the whole day away, now!

A sizeable plushie modeled after the finest bird in all the snowy regions. Climb onto its back, and you'll be able to wrap your whole body around its silky-soft feathers. They're every bit as luxuriant as the real thing!
A traditional heating apparatus with a decidedly portly design. It may look old-fashioned, but you'll be surprised how much warmth it can bring to a room. The perfect companion for the winter months.
A small side table in cool, wintry colors. Comes as a set with an adorable little teddy bear who'll keep you company on those cold, snowy nights.
A snowy-white knitted cushion with a large, rotund design. Just as springy and bouncy as it looks, it's a delight to perch on.
A dusky-looking knitted cushion with a large, rotund design. Just as squishy and soft as it looks, you'll want to sink right into it.
A window looking out on the winter sky outside. The aurora sweeping across the stars is such a rare and magical sight, you'll want to spend the whole evening just gazing at it.
A garland decoration designed to resemble falling snow. Each crystal snowflake faintly sparkles, lending a magical glow to the room around it.
A two-tone wall design featuring refreshing white tones on one side and a comforting blue-gray on the other. They complement one another to give the room a humble elegance.

A floor pre-laid with a selection of warm, wintry rugs. You'll be tempted to roll around just to experience all the different shapes, sizes and textures. Why not call your friends for a comfy pajama party?
A charming backdrop rich with freshly fallen snow. You can just feel the wintry wind blowing through the glistening snowflakes.

A trophy presented to the proud patissier who created this Valentine's Day's most delicious cake. The golden confection inspires exciting new culinary possibilities, while also whetting the appetite for more sweet treats. Careful not to indulge yourself too much!
A table decked out to celebrate a very special anniversary. Gather around to sample all the sweet treats and reminisce over the exciting events of the past year!
A side table decked out to celebrate a very special anniversary. Raise your glass and make a toast to many more happy years ahead!
A music box modeled after the royal palace that serves as a symbol of Landosol. Wind it up to hear a melody so charming, you won't be able to resist humming along.
A stately monument for a special occasion. The rich greenery lends a refreshing air to the room. Strike a pose in front of this monument, and you'll feel like the hero of a fantastic story!

Modeled on Pecorine of the Gourmet Guild, this adorable plush doll is part of the first wave of the charming PriPlushie series. You can't help but smile at the sight of this perpetually peckish princess. All together, now: "How crazy is that?!"

Modeled on Kokkoro of the Gourmet Guild, this adorable plush doll is part of the first wave of the charming PriPlushie series. For those moments when you just can't resist the urge to give your loyal attendant a great big hug.

Modeled on Karyl of the Gourmet Guild, this adorable plush doll is part of the first wave of the charming PriPlushie series. Don't those cute little kitty ears make you want to pat her head all day long? Just don't try it with the real thing, unless you're a fan of death threats.

A decorative pole topped with a beautiful display of flowers. Each time your eyes drift upward, the natural pastel colors will cleanse your mind and soul. What better way to decorate for a special occasion?
A special wall design featuring the fancy balcony of your dreams. When you lean out and gaze across the city, you'll feel like a princess in her castle! Just be careful not to fall!
A classy floor design complete with a deluxe red carpet. Just standing on such a glamorous stage seems to make your back straighten and your attitude sharpen.

Proof that you have conquered Darkblight Crag. Enjoy the thick and creamy flavor of the Ultimate Egg draped across freshly cooked rice, with a dash of potent soy sauce. The more you eat, the more your stomach rejoices!
A fancy couch with a moody black and violet design. Simply lean up against the armrest and you'll instantly feel like the picture of nobility.
A dressing table for those who believe that beauty should be eternal. Gaze into the mirror, and you'll surely see the fairest of them all.
All dolled up in a fabulous headdress, this teddy bear clearly belongs among the ranks of high society. Nobody else is worthy of taking a seat on her exclusive personal chair.
Resting atop a crimson cloth, this candlestick burns with an eerie purple flame. The matching purple roses somehow never seem to wilt.

A resting place fit for a princess of the night. It's said that those who fall asleep here may never want to awaken again. The canopy-style curtains block out the light of the sun, letting you enjoy perfect darkness even in the middle of the day.
A purple cloth partition with the appearance of a gateway to who-knows-where. The thick drapes are fully soundproof, so stepping through them might just bring you eternal peace.
Drape these dark curtains around your living space to transform it into a domain of spiritual enlightenment. The crimson roses stand out like tears of blood against the dusky surface.
A floor with a distinctly mystical design. Atop these purple tiles of light and darkness, the spirits may dance the night away...
A charming water feature decorated with flowers, just the right size for Nebbia to enjoy.
A beautiful outfit in the style of the eastern lands, mounted on a display stand that allows it to serve as a freestanding decorative piece.
A traditional set of ornamental wooden drawers. Though the joints are sturdily fashioned with expert craftsmanship, do be aware that it's not actually intended for climbing on.
A backdrop featuring traditional eastern nature motifs. Said to bring good fortune, this design will let you enjoy an exotic springtime right at home in Landosol.

A trophy granted to those who have become one with the skies of Landosol, soaring and whirling like a spinning top gone wild. The golden heart design supposedly represents the fearless spirit of adventure required to fly such incredible distances. Disclaimer: Kuka is a trained professional (or so we're told). Do not attempt any of her stunts at home!

An adorable bed fashioned from simple wooden logs. The natural green coloring calls to mind a comforting woodland breeze. When you sink into the soft mattress, surrounded by the scent of the forest, you'll sleep like a log yourself!
A rustic partition made from simple wooden boards. The slight gaps allow sunlight to leak through, filling the space with a comforting natural ambience.
A partition made from a single large board of wood. Though the design is simple, it's sturdy enough to protect anyone's privacy, and the plain wooden surface is perfect for pinning up decorations.
A basic, no-frills stool made of wood. Though it doesn't feature a cushion, the seat is carved in a subtle contour to provide a surprisingly comfortable resting place.

A simple wooden stool topped with a cushioned surface. Though compact enough to be suitable for all manner of uses, the cushion itself is deceptively deep, providing a soft texture that will keep you comfortable for hours.
A wooden chair complete with backrest. The classic, uncomplicated design feels reassuringly sturdy, supporting you with all the natural strength of the forest.
A comfy seat designed for a single person. The wooden armrests feel as reliable as an old friend. As you lean back upon the natural green fabric, you'll feel like you're resting in a forest grove.
A bench-style seat fashioned from rustic wooden parts. Though the basic structure is similar to an outdoor bench, the generously-sized cushions make it far more comfortable.
A small shelf constructed from thick wooden branches. The natural curves of the tree give it a comforting aesthetic, making it a perfect spot to display your favorite items.
A simple side table in a rustic style. The classic round shape makes for a pleasing addition to almost any room design.

A curved coffee table designed to show off the grain of the wood it's fashioned from. The natural color and texture only grow in authenticity with years of use, and the rings in the wood serve as a reminder of the forest's years of wisdom.
A place to share dinner with the whole family. Though the planks look uneven at a glance, they're actually carved to provide a smooth surface that's pleasing to the touch.
A classic rug with a leafy-green striped design. Its natural hues are sure to set the heart at ease.
A rug decorated with a simple pattern using natural dyes. Its sturdily woven surface is so welcoming, you might be tempted to curl up for a nap on the floor.

A wooden wall design inspired by traditional woodland lodges. Taking full advantage of the timber's natural curves, the shuttered windows allow slivers of light to filter through like sunbeams through forest leaves.
An unadorned wooden floor design, using a variety of different woods to create an ecological aesthetic. Best enjoyed barefoot, so you can fully appreciate the warm natural textures.

A floral-patterned bed fit to herald the coming of spring. Swaddled in its blankets, you'll feel like you're resting in a field of beautiful blossoms, leaving all the stress of your daily life behind.
Like a knight's trusty shield, this partition protects a maiden's secrets from prying eyes. Though the feminine design looks delicate, it's more than sturdy enough to keep your privacy secure.

You'll be sitting pretty on this adorably petite stool. Though it excels in both sturdiness and comfort, the flowers depicted on its cushioned surface look so delicate that you might hesitate to sit down upon them.

A chair with a design so floral that you can almost detect the scent of petals floating in the wind. Though the design looks as delicate as gossamer, its finely-crafted frame will last you a lifetime.

A single-person seat that brightens up a room like a flower in full bloom. Though the design is lightweight, no corners were cut when it comes to comfort, and its welcoming cushioned surface is popular with young and old alike.
A two-seater sofa with a heartwarming floral design. Perhaps due to its warm, inviting colors, you won't feel lonely even using it on your own. Nope, not lonely at all.

A chic wardrobe, subtly accented with individual flower designs. A word of warning: you may be overcome by the urge to fill it with floral-themed clothing. Perhaps the beauty of the blossoms is a little TOO magical.

A simple chest of drawers with cute flowery adornments. Each drawer seems to release a floral scent when opened, so you might find yourself reaching for the handles even when you don't have any business with the contents.
Popular for its reasonable size and charming floral design, this table is perfect for enjoying afternoon tea. Gather around it for some girls' talk and watch your friendships blossom.

Whether you're laying out an assortment of cakes or a three-course meal, this floral table will provide the perfect backdrop. When gathering around it with friends, you might feel like you're enjoying a picnic in the comfort of your own home.

A wallpaper that seems to embody the scent of flowers in bloom. Surrounded by the soothing colors of spring, neither the oppressive warmth of summer nor the chill of winter will be able to reach you. Its comforting tones are particularly popular with guilds including children.
An elegant floor tiled with rose designs. The pastel pink hues seem to heighten the elegance of the rose petals, giving the room an air of luxury.

A classic beach chair with a sharp, colorful design. Reclining at an angle carefully calculated to relax your entire body, all you'll need is a glass of your favorite drink to complete your own tropical paradise!
A decorative basin filled with refreshing water, its surface decorated with blossoms of various colors. Just gazing upon it is enough to refresh your spirit and take your mind off the summer heat.
A decorative plant with lush, healthy leaves. Place one in your room to make it feel a little more tropical, but don't forget to use the included watering can to keep it in top condition!

Modeled on Maho of Caon, this adorable plush doll is part of the second wave of the charming PriPlushie series. Joining the ranks of the plushies she loves, you can tell she's waiting for her prince to come and give her a big hug.

Modeled on Makoto of Caon, this adorable plush doll is part of the second wave of the charming PriPlushie series. Though she seems rough-and-ready, she's just as soft at heart as this plush representation suggests.

Modeled on Kasumi of Caon, this adorable plush doll is part of the second wave of the charming PriPlushie series. From the satisfied smile on her face, you can tell she must have just solved a perplexing mystery.
Modeled on Kaori of Caon, this adorable plush doll is part of the second wave of the charming PriPlushie series. Why sweat the small stuff when you can cuddle it instead?

A fishbowl so large, it's basically a miniature aquarium. Not only can you gaze at it for hours on end, you can even set up the traditional festival game of goldfish scooping in the comfort of your own home!

A novelty lamp designed to resemble a jellyfish drifting through the ocean depths. With the room bathed in its mysterious green light, you might just feel like the tides are sweeping you away. Lay back and let them carry you to paradise!

A novelty lamp designed to resemble a jellyfish drifting through the ocean depths. With the room bathed in its refreshing blue light, you'll feel like you've sunk beneath the waves yourself. Immerse yourself in a relaxing watery world!

This traditional shishi-odoshi garden ornament is decked out in the colors of autumn, with fallen leaves artfully adorning the water's surface. As the water lifts the bamboo tube, you might see the adorable golem statue blink its eyes.
A set of traditional eastern bedding, decorated with a subtle autumnal design. Its light and gentle cotton sheets might be just what you need on those long autumn nights.

A traditional eastern panel partition decorated with a design featuring the full moon. The pampas grass in the foreground adds to the autumnal mood. When combined with the Autumn Rabbicorn Panel, the two form a complete scene.

A traditional eastern panel partition decorated with a design featuring a leaping Rabbicorn. When combined with the Autumn Moon Panel, the creature seems to be flapping its ears in an attempt to reach the full moon above.
A traditional eastern panel partition made with authentic washi paper. It's always tempting to poke holes in the paper windows, but please spare a thought for the person who has to replace them.

A lamp designed to resemble a traditional lantern. Carved from stone just like the real thing, its warm light casts a calming glow across its surroundings. Place a solitary lantern as an accent to your home's design, or go all-out with a full row of them.
A seat designed for kneeling at a floor-height table, as used in a traditional ryokan inn. The cushion is springy and comfortable, while the backrest curves forward to offer more effective support.

A set containing everything you need for a traditional viewing of the autumn moon. The white dango dumplings, themselves resembling the full moon, have a refined sweetness and are made from freshly pounded mochi.

An ornament in the traditional Shigaraki stoneware style, designed to resemble Master Senri. Though undoubtedly monstrous, this tanuki's burly build is thought to invite success in business affairs. Often seen placed by the entrance to local stores.
A low table designed for use while kneeling, crafted from fine elm wood and decked out with autumnal delicacies for honored visitors.

A decorative miniature tree with gorgeous autumn leaves. Though no more than half the size of standard specimens, its visual impact is anything but small, and will fill your whole room with a seasonal atmosphere.

A traditional style of wall for a classic eastern room. The plaster coating gives it fire-resistant properties and aids in the room's lighting. And fear not—the decorative sword on the wall is only a replica.
Tatami mats with a classic checkered pattern. The woven rush gives off an enticing scent. Stretch out on top of them, and you might nod off before you know it.

A backdrop that surrounds you with the wonders of autumn. With fiery red leaves form a delicate balance with the sight of the moon reflected in water, you'll feel like you're lost in Mother Nature's embrace.
A broomstick-shaped staff that Kyoka prepared for Halloween. The adorable little cat plushie almost looks alive.

A cushion designed to resemble Misaki's weapon and partner, Ai the Eyeball. Though supposedly a formidable creature whose gaze conceals powerful magic, Misaki's rough treatment sometimes leaves that single eye on the verge of tears.
A must-have Halloween item for any prankster. Open this gift to be greeted by a shocking pumpkin surprise! Trick or treat!
Oh, no—how did this adorable bunny end up covered in bandages?! Look a little closer, and you'll notice even the bandages are tied in cute little ribbons. How could anyone resist giving it a big hug?
An eerie background that will send little chills down your spine. Bathed in the light of this great big moon, the whole city seems ready for Halloween.
A mysterious fountain that seems to produce a never-ending supply of liquid chocolate. You can dip any morsel you like into it, but double-dipping is strictly forbidden!
A cash register that seems somehow quaint despite being decked out with all the latest features. So easy to operate, anyone can run a cafe of their own!
A showcase filled with a variety of delicious-looking confections. Careful when you open it—the sweet scent that wafts forth is impossible to resist.
A background dotted with cute illustrations of the cafe's most popular food items. Try not to stare too long, or you'll probably get hungry.
A sack filled to the brim with presents for the festive season. Even packed with magical extras like love, dreams and hope, it's sure to put smiles on everyone's faces when they reach inside.
A snowman designed to resemble a great big cuddly animal. There must be some special magic at work, because it shows no signs of melting even indoors. Cuteness is eternal!
A festive snow globe with a decorated tree as its centerpiece. You might lose track of time as you watch the tiny flakes of snow flutter by!
A background that expresses all the childlike joy of the festive season. Combine it with festive furniture to really get in a jolly mood!

A glamorous hot spring bath, decorated with all the ostentation you'd expect from the creator it's named for. The surprisingly deep spring water has powerful restorative properties, so it's a hit with hardworking young ladies who need to wash away their daily concerns.

Proof that you have conquered Jadewyrm's Roost. A hearty hotpot using the meat that came free while pulling the spines from a great dragon's tail. This legendary ingredient from the king of all creatures opens up new horizons for gourmets around the world. Even after being thoroughly stewed, the dragon's lingering vigor causes the tail to grow back any bites you take out of it.
A dusky-looking seat for one that can be combined with other segments to make a larger sofa. Link a whole chain of them to seat all your friends!
A dusky-looking seat for one designed to form the corner of a larger combined sofa. The possible combinations are as limitless as your imagination!
A snow-white seat for one that can be combined with other segments to make a larger sofa. Link a whole chain of them for that special gathering!
A snow-white seat for one designed to form the corner of a larger combined sofa. Experiment with different layouts to create your own stylish space!

A cozy low chair designed for a lazy afternoon of woolly activities. With yarn and needles at the ready, you'll be tempted to start knitting right away. If you're lacking in knitting experience, maybe some small, cuddly friends can lend a hand?
A multifunctional bed decked out with adorable plushies for maximum relaxation potential. Thanks to all that space underneath the bed itself, it's ideal for efficient storage.

A wand imbued with love and hope, said to appear when a certain magical incantation is chanted. Resonating with Kasumi's passion for seeking the truth, it transforms her into Magical Detective Misty★Kasumi. All together now: "With a wave of my wand, I'm on the case!"

A bow imbued with love and hope, said to appear when a certain magical incantation is chanted. Resonating with Shiori's pure and innocent feelings, it transforms her into Magical Huntress Purely★Shiori. All together now: "My arrows of love won't miss your heart!"
An incredible swinging bench designed for that momentous two-year celebration. Filled with uplifting emotions, the balloons might just carry you off into the sunset.
A decorative stand covered in balloons, designed for that momentous two-year celebration. Each balloon is filled with precious memories from the past two years.

Designed for that momentous two-year celebration, how crazy is this set of extra-special balloons? With one for each member of the Gourmet Guild, it'll fill your heart and stomach with delicious memories!

Technologically advanced yet somehow retro in style, this mysterious table allows you to enjoy a variety of gaming delights. Whether you're tasting thrilling victories or frustrating failures, these diversions might remind you of past adventures. Do you have what it takes to master every challenge?
A photo board decorated with the memories of an adventure with New Generations. Gaze upon it to keep those memories close to your heart.

Originating at St. Theresa's Academy for Girls, this mechanical wonder is the product of a certain young genius's academic achievements. Significantly miniaturized compared to the original Friendbot X, its various features have also been updated. Most impressive of all, its creator informs us, is its ability to follow you around the room while chanting "Cheru~n!" Isn't technology incredible?
A cute couch with a chic design and pastel pink leather upholstery. Combining the girlish and the ladylike, its distinctive charms have earned it admirers of all ages.

A pastel pink dressing table mounted on stylish cabriole legs. Fashion-conscious young ladies swear by its brightly polished mirror, which is said to bring out the owner's cutest attributes. Take care, though—those with vain tendencies may find themselves entranced by their own reflection.
A gigantic plush rabbit in an adorable pastel pink dress. Her outward sweetness belies an impish nature, and very few are immune to her charms!

A decorative lamp shaped like a pair of roses in bloom. The single white ribbon provides a cute accent to offset the elegant roses, but its avant-garde design is nonetheless popular with serious art critics as well as its intended consumer audience.
An elegant bed combining daintiness and sophistication. Fitted with the kind of luxurious canopy that every young girl longs for, it can whisk you away to a comforting world of dreams.

A partition featuring a pair of pastel pink curtains. Although its design tends towards the cute, its curtains are more than capable of concealing any secrets a lady would rather not reveal. Though there's always the temptation to nudge them aside and take a forbidden peek...
A wall design decorated with curtains in creamy, comforting colors. The floral window frame and minimalist yet luxuriant decorations make for a refined atmosphere.

A floor design featuring a distinctive floral emblem in the center and a checkered design. The warm colors put the mind at ease and elevate one's mood, to the point that many customers report breaking out into a spontaneous jig.

A classic blackboard combined with a similarly traditional teacher's desk. Whether you want to teach a real lesson or just doodle with chalk, this installation has got you covered! Just don't forget to tidy up when you're done.
A wooden school desk with a matching seat. Just the right height for studying... or, if you use the textbooks as a handy pillow, for taking a nap when the teacher isn't looking.
A supply set consisting of a broom and dustpan. Designed in a slightly larger-than-average size to increase cleaning efficiency.

A wooden locker for personal use. The tall size makes it possible to stow even full outfits without any folding. Try to keep the contents in order, though, because if it gets too messy, you might fall victim to a veritable avalanche upon opening it.
A double-sided wooden bookcase. Popular with bookworms for its significant storage capacity. The subtle decorative elements are clearly the work of an artisan.
A retro style of wall clock popular with educational institutions. The pendulum ticks along with a reassuring rhythm, lulling students to sleep while they're supposed to be taking exams.

A corkboard for posting notices, lesson materials and the like. Perfect for timetables or reminders, it comes in useful for all kinds of school activities. The colorful decorations were designed by creative students.
A stairwell that seems likely to lead to the upper floors of a classic wooden schoolhouse. The sturdy design has a comforting, nostalgic quality.
A stairwell that seems likely to lead to the lower floors of a classic wooden schoolhouse. The corners are liable to gather dust, so take extra care when cleaning them.
A wall design straight out of a school classroom. Don't forget to close the windows at the end of the day, or the memos and lesson materials posted to the walls might blow away.
A wooden floor that has stood the test of time. The waxed surface is easy to clean and difficult to damage. If you're planning to make a classroom, this floor is a good place to start!
